title: 18: Death of the smartwatch, with Daniel Bader
description: Gartenberg, Ritchie, and special guest Daniel Bader talk about the state of the smartwatch: Android Wear 2.0 delays, Motorola 360 exists, Pebble buyouts, Apple Watch market, and more!
itunes:author: Michael Gartenberg, Rene Ritchie, Daniel Bader
itunes:subtitle: Gartenberg, Ritchie, and special guest Daniel Bader talk about the state of the smartwatch: Android Wear 2.0 delays, Motorola 360 exists, Pebble buyouts, Apple Watch market, and more!
itunes:summary: Gartenberg, Ritchie, and special guest Daniel Bader talk about the state of the smartwatch: Android Wear 2.0 delays, Motorola 360 exists, Pebble buyouts, Apple Watch market, and more!
